events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills with software development.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be contacting you shortly for the next steps.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully. The recruiter highlighted your strong background in software engineering principles.
Thank you for responding promptly. Your readiness for the upcoming technical interview is appreciated and noted.
The technical interview with our senior engineers has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM. Please prepare accordingly.
